channel.title: Tribal Wars
channel.description:
This is a strategic game that I'm quite fond of. In a nutshell;
Tribal Wars is a browser-based game set in the Middle Ages. Every player controls a small village, striving for power and glory.
I am currently playing on World 75, if you're curious I would recommend checking it. If you're on another world already I'd like to be joined. Tribal Wars: http://www.tribalwars.net (optional) Referral link: http://www.tribalwars.net/9805094-664-en75.html?ref=player_invite_linkrl&ik=wyrm Simple but fun :)

item.title: Tribal Wars
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Used to be ranked 8th in my area, was awesome. Unfortunately after a while it becomes so slow and at the same time so overwhelming.

Read full topic
